com.dukascopy.api.system.tester

Interface ITesterChartController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClientChartController

    public interface ITesterChartController
extends IClientChartController
    Allows control over the chart object.

    • Method Summary

      void setChartAutoShift()
      Activates chart Auto Shift
      void setFeedDescriptor(IFeedDescriptor feedDescriptor)
      Changes chart type.
      The Instrument and OfferSide of the IFeedDescriptor are ignored.
      To change OfferSide use switchOfferSide(OfferSide).
      The Filter value of the IFeedDescriptor is set globally and propagated to all open charts.

      Sets the Filter globally which will be propagated to all open charts.

      • changePeriod

        @Deprecated
void changePeriod(DataType dataType,
                           Period period)
        Deprecated. 
        Changes chart time period. Use for the DataType.TIME_PERIOD_AGGREGATION
        Parameters:
        dataType - - see DataType.
        period - - see Period.

      • setFeedDescriptor

        void setFeedDescriptor(IFeedDescriptor feedDescriptor)
        Changes chart type.
        The Instrument and OfferSide of the IFeedDescriptor are ignored.
        To change OfferSide use switchOfferSide(OfferSide).
        The Filter value of the IFeedDescriptor is set globally and propagated to all open charts.
        Parameters:
        feedDescriptor - - see IFeedDescriptor
        See Also:
        setFilter(Filter), getFilter()

      • showEquityIndicator

        void showEquityIndicator(boolean show)
        Makes the indicator visible or invisible.
        Parameters:
        show - true to make the indicator visible; false to make it invisible
